greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of coefficients of elementary symmetric functions in the monomial symmetric function of the integer partition with Heinz number n.
comment: The Heinz number of an integer partition (y_1, ..., y_k) is prime(y_1) * ... * prime(y_k).
example: The sum of coefficients of m(2211) = 9e(6) + e(42) - 4e(51) is a(36) = 6.
xref: Row sums of A321746. An unsigned version is A008480.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Nov 19 2018
